pull.title: doc: Fix broken bitcoin-cli examples
pull.body: This fixes the `bitcoin-cli` examples for `combinerawtransaction`, `combinepsbt` and `testmempoolaccept`. They currently return `Error parsing JSON`.

events.body: ACK e71cc9086481fd7a62df96296ee2baeb43e06ed0, tested having / not having JSON decode errors for examples given before / after.

Concept ACK

I did a quick grep and I think `combinepsbt` has the same issue so you could add it.
@fjahr Ahh I missed that one. Updated.

comments.body:
why not use single quotes here? that'd avoid having to escape the inner `"`'s
(also using a C++11 raw string literal R"(…)" could potentially make this more readable)
